Name: Izakaya

Name: Izakaya
Review Text:
We got 7 course menu, which was a pretty good choice.
Every dish was unique and delicious.
I found the service fine and the waiters were friendly. …

Name: Izakaya

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Food was very nice, not cheap but it is hip and trendy, so it is as could be aspected. We had a full lunch with 6 courses and two bottles of wine, when we refilled our glasses with the bottle from our wine cooler, it ended up not being our …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Good food, but it is supposed to be good for this kind of money. Service is lacking sometimes, they're just not alert, seemingly busy with anything but the guests. Good music but pretty loud, what's the point of that in the afternoon? To be …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Exceptional! Every dish looked and tasted amazing. One of the best in Amsterdam, worth every penny.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Oh my god. We really wanted to visit this restaurant after reading the recommandations. We decided to come at lunch hour hoping to get more space and time for this food experience. This turned out to be a great idea. Everything on the menu …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: This place is all smoke & mirrors. My mother in law waited over an hour for her sea bass and we had all finished with our meals. The mushroom pot was so bland and totally simple, I don’t know how they think it’s ethical to charge 36 euros …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text:
Nice Asian/Peruvian fusion restaurant in Amsterdam. The food is good and the menu is very long with plenty of choices.
Desserts were the highlight, really a good combination of textures flavors. …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: That’s definitely NOT sushi. The sashimi consists of small pieces of fish swimming in sauce partially cooked by the acidity. The rolls were OK, but not worthy the price tag. …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Unlike traditional izakayas where the food shines through its natural presentation and letting ingredients speak for themselves, this restaurant opted to douse most of their dishes with strong flavours, overpowering most of the often …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Too expensive for small and mediocre dishes and unfriendly waitress too.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: I had a lovely dinner here on a thursday evening. It's a fancy, slightly posh-feeling restaurant. It was very busy and they had loud electronic music being dj-ed live. That wasn't so amazing, but I can see the appeal for some. The service …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Best place in Amsterdam so far. The spinach salad is unbelievably good, with truffle oil and parmesan cheese. The 3 kind of sashimi is my favorite. I don’t really like the music they have (too fashion for me) and is a little noise but the food is great. Very recommended!

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Got a last minute bar seating during a busy Friday night. Great vibe - music might be a tad too loud lol but you get used to it after awhile. Our bartender, Vincenzo, made us amazing drinks and gave food recommendations that were perfect …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Great decor, bustling vibe, beautiful waitresses. The food is Japanese fusion and it's quite good. The salad with prawn, miso, parmesan and truffle was very good, but I thought other dishes were ordinary (the aburi salmon nigiri) but others …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text:
could have been so good if not for the service

We had high hopes but the service smashed them up. …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Aw man, surprisingly delicious. And not just that, staff super friendly and extra shoutout to the bartenders as they are really cool, attentive and knowledgeable about what the choose food wise and drink wise. One note, guys it’s ok to …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text:
Amazing food and ambiance!
The Staff is very Friendly and the vibes there are Chic and funky
You should go at least once!

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Definitely not a cheap place, but very nice food! Fresh fish, huge menu, interesting twist. Also cocktails are pretty good

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Great athmosohere and music. Good food. Service is worth recommendation. The desserts were exceptional! Prices are high.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: A distinctive culinary expérience enhanced by the enthusiastic service staff! Thanks to our Brazilian angel for the Cachaca recommendation

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Fantastic restaurant, fresh food, friendly, and well located!! I just would say that maybe the music was a bit loud!!! To not miss in Amsterdam!!!

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: The cocktails are amazing, the atmosphere is great and the staff is extraordinarily friendly. The place had an amazing view of the canal, you can enjoy. The prices are good.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Hostesses are unskilled and unkind. They are incapable of making people feel welcome. Which is an essential part of being a hostess. They portray an old-fashioned image. Showing a lot of skin, a lot of "couldn't care about the guest" and …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Pretty decent fish, lovely place to sit outside and eat, quite expensive - a hotel restaurant attached to the Sir Albert, so extended hours. Fancy cocktails: great mahattan.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: The food was just awful. Beef tataki was only taste like a vinegar and you will have this taste till the next morning in your mouth !!! Squats had 0 taste at all, and their most popular dish on fried rice with some tar tar… you have only …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Very disappointing. The food was ok but the whole place is very fake. We have had a very unwelcoming experience. The team is unprofessional and even rude. At the end of our very expensive dîner we asked for an invoice with taxes amount and …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: This particular restaurant is at a central point in Amsterdam. the food is excellent as well as the service by the employees. food prices are relatively high but they really deserve special sushi is just fine.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Great restaurant for a special night out. Its expensive of course but worth it. I believe they can improve their desserts! …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Amazing food! Great service and an incredible atmosphere! I will definitely recommend going.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: A fantastic restaurant with some of the best sushi I have ever had I would have no hesitation to recommend this place to anybody absolutely fantastic

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Ambiance is ok but food quality compared to the price is not worth it. You can definitely get better food for the same (or below) price. Food presentation is basic AF. 250€ for nothing.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Innovative Peruvian/ Japanese cuisine. Great cocktails and sublime food.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Was expecting street food style. Ended up being a bougie style. We had the Omakse and was BLOWN AWAY! Seven courses. Worth every penny!! The presentation, the food quality, our waiter. Everything succeeded our expectations.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Best...Asian...restaurant...ever! All the food is great,tasty, exquisite and delicious. Everytime I come to Amsterdam I don't miss Izakaya. Great selection of wines as well.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: A true hotspot of Amsterdam. Heard some great stories about this restaurant and they lived up to every expectation! The waiter helped us choose the best dishes in combination with lovely wines. This is a true dinner experience if you are looking for something special. Best sushi I've had in a long time, we will come back for sure!

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Elegant yet expensive, crowded and distinguished. Would recommend it if you are not looking for a candlelight dinner.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Wonderful service and delicious food! Tapas style so portions vary. The waiters took time to make sure we were seated comfortably, explained the menu to us and made recommendations. Would definitely love to come back!

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Solid Asian food restaurant in Amsterdam. Tasteful fish and good courses. Wine list is quite limited.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: The desserts at this restaurant are marvellous. A must stop on every visit to Amsterdam. A special mention to the pastry chef Lamisah, Hands of magic :D

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Nice ambience and great food!

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: The food is good and the service friendly, but it's not right price-quality wise, way too expensive for what it is. The restaurant seems to be short on waiters so it takes ages to place an order; sadly the buzz girls are not allowed to take …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Great food! If they don't have a table get seats at the bar; doesn't make the food any worse! Try the Tempura Corn for sure!

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Nothing short of AMAZING. The food here, every single dish, is just brilliant. In the like 30 times ive eaten here the experience is consitently awesome. With dito waitering.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text:
The service was friendly and the staff knowledgeable and sweet.
However, it was extremely fast service and we were in and out within 1.15hrs, spending 200€. …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Great food, but in terms of value for money a bit lacking. Also, the wine list is really nothing special but 8-10 euros a glass. Service is correct and friendly, they work with a shift system.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Ambience good located in albert cuyp, so many choices for food options but i love is the one i tried the baby squid and the place is calm and cozy

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Friendly cool place with excellent service, competent hands-on people and really good food:)!!

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: I have visited Izakaya twice already. On the second occasion, we made a booking at a specific time, and we knew we were going to be late around 30-45 minutes, so we tried to call the restaurant but no one answered. The restaurant cancelled …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Izakaya is an asian fusion restaurant mainly japanese but with some other inspiration. The location isn’t big but well set up. The food selection is well balanced and dishes are delicious. The staff is fine, nothing over the top. Music can …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Japanese / Peruvian flavors with loud music and open bar style eating. We walked into this restaurant and sat at the main bar without reservation. The rest of the seating appears to be bar style sharing a long wood table cut direct from a …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Service is absolutely amazing. Manager Ralf is such a knowledgeable and kind host. His eye for detail is simply impeccable. Amazing dishes. We had such a wonderful time wining and dining at this pearl. Absolute ACE.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: The food, drinks and service are all excellent.  Definitely a little pricey but very much worth it once you experience it!  Great place for a special night out.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Easily the most overrated restaurant in all of Amsterdam—came here for a special evening with my wife. We ordered a mushroom dish that was so terrible that we sent it back. An eel dish that was chewy—not melt in your mouth tasty as well …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Picked up the sushi box for 49 euros. If you are a small eater and normally always order a starter as a main- sure! For me it did feel like just a starter. I expected a bit more for 49 euros. Overpriced.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Great cocktails; very nice fish; impeccable service and a great vibe. Izakaya is a great place both for dining with your partner and for bringing friends together. …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Fresh food, surprising tastes. The menu is long enough not to know what to order. We were indecisive so the waitress asked for main indications (seafood, meat) and consequently made us an amazing custom set menu. The dark atmosphere is enjoyable but the house music is way too loud, and not appropriate.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text:
Honestly, I expected a lot better than this. My gf and I booked in Saturday night for our anniversary dinner in Amsterdam South.
Cocktail served was watery, too sweet and not at all like a picante. Sent …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text:
The best thing is the food!
Really outstanding!
The design seems to be so cool and unique so it is not comfortable and a little …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: The food was delicious and beautifully presented, the service was very nice and attentive. The price is a bit on th high end and during our stay an employee started vacuuming the place which was a bit irritating. Worth a visit for sure!

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Amazing 7 course dinner - my boyfriend was celebrating his birthday, they made a special dessert for him and gave us 2 espresso martinis. I would recommend this restaurant if you love sushi

Name: Izakaya
Review Text:
A top notch Asian restaurant.
Perfect service and very tasty menu.
The portions ate very small just like in any other otzi potzi restaurant. Some …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: The food was okay. But nothin worth the money. Service was a bit slow. Anywhere in Ibiza where you pay the same prices bit beter with better service. And quality We don’t care about money, but if it’s just not worth it we would tell. Izakaya is just not it. Btw I have a big stomach ache after izakaya

Review Text: Met here for dinner with a group friends on Friday. During dinner we were rushed to order as they wanted to free up the table at 9pmin in case they could sell the table for a second shift.Not exactly the setting for an evening with friends …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Extremely expensive and very small portions. Quality is TOP. Staff very arrogant. You go hungry again from the restaurant but at least 100 € for a few sushi going on. Very loud music, so that you can hardly talk. No thanks.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Good buy overpriced! Without a doubt the quality of the whole service and food is good but it is not the 'best you hope for' when you pay this amount of money for your food and drinks. There are plenty restaurants in town with food and more knowledge about wat they serve you.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Food was excellent, portions are small but with so many courses your end up leaving full. I found the menu a tad overpriced and the music  a bit too loud, but the restaurant fills a nice niche for “cool” “trendy” restaurant vibe.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: This place is terribly over rated. The menus just have random names of dishes but no descriptions of what is included in the dish. Our server took a really long time to get menu's to us so we asked her to send some **starter** food to our …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Really, really good food. Japanese and South American fusion is something any sushi lover has to try! A tad expensive, and the place can get quite loud later in the evening due to how popular it is. (Not necessarily a bad thing to be so …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Cocktails could be better and less expensive, or orgasmically delicious for this price. The design of the place could be much better designed. The inox or aluminium bar is not very cosy.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Great food, great people. Beyond expectations. 👍

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Great food, the down side is the high price. The chillian sea bass is amazing. There was only one Prosecco option, which was ashame, but they have a good champagne selection. Trendy place and clientele. I will revisit.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text:
Really nice place for brunch or dinner. Very good and tasty food and cocktails!

It's a bit pricey, but definitely a good decision you want to do a little splurge.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Today we went to izakaya for dinner and we were served by a young man named michael, the service was 10/10, he really should get a salary raise, he helped us with making a choice for the food, he explained every detail and the food he recommended was more than delicious, we loved our dinner thanks to michael! 🤍

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: The cocktails here are expensive, small, and not all that tasty. The music has a continuous beat as if you are at a house party. If you are not dressed in black and above forty, you don’t fit in. Cannot judge the food but it was looking good.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Super expensive but the food and cocktails were amazing. A beautiful bar. Attentive service. Must order backed oyster!

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Delicious food and super nice staff! The flavors are so fresh and the quality of the courses is really honorable. Great restaurant 👍

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Was amanzing place for have a dinner, me and my girdfriend booking in izakaya in our last night in Amterdam, and we realy apreciate the service of the crew and the floor manager was  realy near off us, totality recomendate. Thansk for the experience!

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: They position themselves as a luxurious exclusive place but this is not so. Just show off. Food was very usual for restaurant with michelen prices. I expected more but I liked absolutely nothing

Name: Izakaya
Review Text:
Chic , hip and excellent Japanese inspired kitchen . Connected to a hotel the people behind the scenes know how to serve and set standards .
Service and quality always on a high level . Pricy but worth every cent .
Good cocktail List and happening bar .

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Too much salt in almost all dishes we ordered. For the money you pay the food is absolutely nothing special, and I would say any quite average Japanese place in a small alley around a courner could win blind tastings against this place. It …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Really nice place, you can taste flavour of many part of the glove with excellent preparation, mix Asian and Latin American essence in a trendy spot, Wagyu beef it's delightful also the Wagyu and Foie Gras gyosas can be a good way to start.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: A beer, 6 slices of sashimi and 2 shrimps, €44! What a rip off. It's not an Izakaya restaurant at all - maybe 2 things on the menu count as Izakaya. Maybe bring a date here for a beer but don't waste your money on the food

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: I went here a while back, and everything was way overpriced. And why would you call your restaurant IZAKAYA in all caps, when what you offer is exactly the opposite of the izakaya experience? I really don't get this, as if the owner is just …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: I was here a few weeks ago. The atmosphere is all right, but without any particular character. Food is mediocre at best and spectacularly overpriced. Mad props for the fantastic dj, though.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Definitely to expensive for what you get. Food is average and much better at other international places like zuma or nobu. Interior design is zero. Service is good. Worst thing is the music. Way to loud and not good selected.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Great vibe and good food. Our server, Charissa was extremely helpful. Highly recommend if Asian fusion is what you like.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Decend cocktail, but very rude hostess. I do expect little bit more service. If i ask a simple question for the bill, i just got short answer ask my other colleague.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text:
Wow   man

My host was Giulia and she was super skilful and she made great cocktail for me. …

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Amazing food and drinks... Wow! I recommend it a lot! 😏

Name: Izakaya
Review Text:
Service was very good and friendly.
Went there with high expectations looking for real Japanese food; it was a big disappointment being served non Japanese rice (probably that day the preparation was not good only? Rice was mushi and felt low quality)

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Hectic atmosphere, weird seating arrangement, slow service and small & overpriced dishes. Not worth the effort, unless one wants to impress and appear to be hip.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Happy to be here, good food and drinks. Wonderful experience.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: As a foodie I love good food. I think Izakaya is the best Japanese restaurant in Amsterdam. Spicy tuna is divine here. And make sure to try the gyoza. Good cocktails too!

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Balanced to perfection. Can get busy on special ocassions but they sure know how to deliver top quality food and service. A must visit for anyone in the area.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Superb food from the chef at the window to the kitchen, inside the elegant restaurant. Kindly service and great chefs. All dishes was simply delicious

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Great food, wine selection was perfect and they managed to cater for our large group really well. Friendly service and great atmosphere.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Classy atmosphere, hip music, wannabe cool people, nice cocktails and great Japanese fusion cuisine. Staff is okay, but they insisted I'd take off my hipster hat... Sigh

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Not cheap, but money very well spent. Proud and helpful staff know the menu well and happy to help you choose quantity and quality. Book ahead, nearly always busy.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Food is fresh and tasty, friendly crew and perfect atmosphere but a bit pricey with respect to serving portions.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Very good food. Good sushi selection.  The fatty tuna was to die for.  Fruity cocktail.what else can a girl ask for.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: They take too long to bring food

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Nice, smart but the food doesn't pack the punch the prices do! Asian-ish. The cocktails aren't great but the beef "tobish?" Is delicious

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Good clean fresh.. Cool

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Very nice vibe at the resto.. service was top class.. the food was prepared with loads of delicacy.. a must visit in Amsterdam.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: I was there for lunch and had the salmon bento box. It was very overpriced at 25 EUR for what you get, and not very inventive at all. Whilst the quality was ok, it lacked flavour.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Food is descent. But, this place is trying so hard to be as if it is in Milan, NYC or London. A bunch of wannabes! Waiting to get a table and bunch girls just blow past me .....thinking they were models to go ask for a table.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Hi end food for the foodies! Delicious in every aspect, service, taste and presentation! Highly recommended!!

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: One of the best meals i ever had. Beautiful presentation, well explained menu and really friendly service.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: I strongly recommend to sit at the bar, you will have a central position and will be able to talk to the very cool waiters. The food is just amazing, that is just as simple as that.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Good food and cocktails. Bit expensive. Saw Rihana eating there once, so it attracts stars as well

Name: Izakaya
Review Text:
Amazing food! Amazing crew! Amazing chef!
You Must try the oyster filo it's "to die for"!

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: A little bit on the expensive side with small portions, but the food is amazing. If you have some money to spend definitely go there.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Good food, nice drinks. Setting is halfway between hip and hotel restaurant ish. Service generally good

Name: Izakaya
Review Text:
Very classy place, very nice sushi, very friendly staff, and very nice cocktails.
Definitely a place I'd recommend.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Food is tasty but very expensive for what you get. Staff also do a lot of up-selling which is annoying

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: one of the nicest places in Amsterdam!! :-)

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Always delicious. Popcorn shrimp, eel, mmmm.  Go with the Chefs tasting menu.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: The Wagyu/Foie Gras Gyozas are to die for. Excellent service and a lively, atmosphere with good music.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: An amazing place. One of the best in Amsterdam if not Holland.a must visit for fans of Asian cuisine or if you love fine dining.

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: Excellent location and ambience. Menu is off the beaten track but nonetheless great food and good cocktails

Review Text:

Name: Izakaya
Review Text: This is not a usual restaurant , food is very good, service is ok and prices are not for casual dinner. So if you can afford it, go for it

Name: Izakaya
